ai-tha-ap248:1.2_0: the great hermit went to the great hermit.
ai-tha-ap248:1.4_0: to the noble ones, upright and poised,
ai-tha-ap248:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap248:2.4_0: This fruit will be the fruit.
ai-tha-ap248:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap248:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāsi.
ai-tha-ap248:5.1_0: sixth hundred senior monks with a thousand.
